---------------------------------------
Description in English 
---------------------------------------
 Written by Peter Morgan (THE LAST KING OF SCOTLAND, THE QUEEN), 
this acclaimed play makes the transition from stage to screen with Ron Howard (CINDERELLA MAN, A BEAUTIFUL MIND) in the director's chair. Frank Langella and Michael Sheen revisit their roles as the title characters in this drama that pits the impeached president against British TV host David Frost.
